title: Geoengineering and Weather Manipulation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/22/17
itunes:title: Geoengineering and Weather Manipulation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/22/17
description:
Guest host Jimmy Church and researcher Dane Wiggington discuss the efforts by world governments to use chem trails to control the weather for their benefits, and to turn it into a weapon to attack other countries.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
